comment.author: 77603809@N02
comment._content: Imagini bântuie...is there a story behind these portraits?

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: Not really, they're just usual people's portraits taken by a regular photographer :)

comment.author: 77603809@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/costicaacsinte] Thank you. I was impressed by the intensity of expression on many of them.

comment.author: 77603809@N02
comment._content: I wonder how you came to have these...it is an amazing archive.

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77603809@N02] First war just passed and second war was knocking on the door, maybe that's way :)

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77603809@N02] A local museum acquired the plates from photographer's family and i persuaded the museum to let me do the scanning.

comment.author: 77603809@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/costicaacsinte] Thank you, I understand. It is a very valuable collection of now silent memories. Mulțumesc foarte mult.
